entry.title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning
entry.summary:
At 02:15 pm, MetService weather radar detected severe thunderstorms near TE POHUE and PATOKA.
These severe thunderstorms are moving towards the eastnortheast, and are expected to lie near TE POHUE, WAIKOAU and PATOKA at 02:45 pm and near TUTIRA, TE POHUE and WAIKOAU at 03:15 pm.
These thunderstorms are expected to be accompanied by very heavy rain.
Impact:
Very heavy rain can cause surface and/or flash flooding about streams, gullies and urban areas, and make driving conditions extremely hazardous.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Thunderstorms possible this afternoon. Note, rain easing from the south late afternoon. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Watch has been decreased to Low.
